name: Instagram-picture
body:
# Instagram-Picture
***

Instagram-Picture is a Wordpress Plugin

Wordpress: http://wordpress.org/plugins/instagram-picture/

Website: http://tb-webtec.de/instagram_picture

Wiki: http://github.com/TB-WebTec/Instagram-Picture/wiki/Index

***

Additional function auto update

https://github.com/TB-WebTec/Instagram-Picture-auto-update

***

## Changelog

Version 2.0
* **New Module**: Widget (User-Infos)
* **New Module**: Lightbox
* **New Module**: Remove images (public or not public)
* **Improvement**: Code revision
* **Improvement**: 15 new Styles (Widget)
* **Improvement**: Hover effect
* **Improvement**: Admin-Page Style
* **Improvement**: Check whether there are enough pictures
* **Bugfix**: Formular submit
* **Bugfix**: cURL connection
* **Bugfix**: Special character issue in title

***

Version 1.3.4
* **Bugfix**: cURL SSL connection problem
* **Bugfix**: Instagram title storage (mysql_real_escape_string)

***

Version 1.3.3
* **Improvement**: Update function
* **Bugfix**: Menu manage_options

***

Version 1.3.2
* **SEE Version 1.3 Very Important**
* **Bugfix**: Activation

***

Version 1.3.1
* **SEE Version 1.3 Very Important**
* Update unfortunately failed 

***

Version 1.3
* **Very Important: You need to update your pictures again. Also disable that plugin after the update, and activate it again. And the Style IDs have changed.**
* **New Module**: Shortcode function with Picture Infos (Likes, Commies) and much more
* **New Module**: Widget with Picture Infos (Likes, Commies)
* **Improvement**: Admin-Panel
* **Bugfix**: Delete option

***

Version 1.2
* **New Module**: Border-Radius
* **Improvement**: Source coding (now with blank space)
* **Extension**: new Styles

***

Version 1.1.1
* **Bugfix**: Plugin activation

***

Version 1.1
* **Bugfix**: Style referencing

***

Version 1.0
* Initial release
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
